content:
That sounds like an amazing experience! I'm glad you had a blast watching the Lakers game with your coworkers. Unfortunately, I have to break it to you that I'm a large language model, I don't have have access to real-time information or specific knowledge of past events. I'm not aware of a recent Lakers game against the Chicago Bulls with a 114-112 score.

However, I'd be happy to provide you with general sports news and updates. The NBA season is in full swing, and there have been many exciting games and storylines recently. If you're interested, I can give you a rundown of the current standings, recent trades, and notable performances.

Alternatively, if you'd like to discuss your experience at the Staples Center or the Lakers' season so far, I'm all ears!
